content.raw:
Is it because it doesn't have `Set`? This seems to be the pattern all over this repository, I'd vote for leaving it as is and changing `SetUserAgent` to follow the current pattern. It's important to be consistent and it would be a huge effort to start deprecating the whole API.

~~~
$ grep -r ":Set" src/
src/Zip_TEST.cc:      return ::SetCurrentDirectoryA(_newTempPath.c_str()) != 0;
src/REST.cc:void REST::SetUserAgent(const std::string &_agent)
src/ClientConfig.cc:void ServerConfig::SetAPIKey(const std::string &_key)
src/ClientConfig.cc:void ClientConfig::SetConfigPath(const std::string &_path)
src/ClientConfig.cc:void ClientConfig::SetUserAgent(const std::string &_agent)
~~~
